{{author infobox | image= | name=Manfred Zimmermann | born= | died= | education=PhD from the [[Wikipedia:University of Marburg|University of Marburg]], Germany | occupation=Author, professor, lecturer | location=Cincinnati, Ohio (US)
Germany }} Dr. phil. '''Manfred Zimmermann''' is a retired German professor and lecturer. In [[1978]] Zimmermann completed his doctorate in German Philology at the University of Marburg,Manfred Zimmermann: ''Die Sterzinger Miszellaneen-Handschrift'', Göppingen 1980 (preface) where he worked as a Lecturer at the Institute for Medieval German Philology.''Zeitschrift für deutsches Altertum und deutsche Literatur'' 111 (1982), p. 145 He then worked for over 20 years as an Associate Professor for Medieval German Studies at the [[Wikipedia:McMicken College of Arts and Sciences (A&s)|McMicken College of Arts and Sciences]] of the [[Wikipedia:University of Cincinnati|University of Cincinnati]][https://web.archive.org/web/20100615101350/http://www.artsci.uc.edu/collegemain/faculty_staff/profile_details.aspx?ePID=MTEzODk%3D Archived profile] at the [[Wikipedia:McMicken College of Arts and Sciences (A&s)|McMicken College of Arts and Sciences]] website (accessed 12 March 2025) until his retirement in 2014.Digital correspondence between professor Todd Herzog and [[User:MallornTea]] ==Bibliography, selected== *[[1981]]:[[Mythlore 28|''Mythlore'' 28]] **"Rendering of Tolkien's Alliterative Verse" **"Tolkien: A German view" (review of ''J.R.R. Tolkien: "Fantasy Literature" als Wunscherfulling und Weltdeutung'' by Dieter Petzold) *[[1982]]: [[Mythlore 30|''Mythlore'' 30]] **"Early Glimpses of Middle-earth" *[[1983]]: [[Mythlore 34|''Mythlore'' 34]] **"The Origin of Gandalf and [[Josef Madlener]]" *[[1985]]: [[Mythlore 41|''Mythlore'' 41]] **"Miscellaneous Remarks on Gimli and on Rhythmic Prose" *[[1988]]: ''Mittelalter-Rezeption III. Gesammelte Vorträge des Symposions‚ Mittelalter, Massenmedien, neue Mythen'' **"Mittelalter in Mittelerde" *[[1988]]: ''Translations of "The Hobbit" Reviewed'' (''Quettar Special Publication'' 2) **"The Hobbit in Germany" *[[1991]]: [[Mythlore 66|''Mythlore'' 66]] **"Letter" {{references}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zimmerman, Manfred}} [[Category:Authors]] [[Category:German people]] [[Category:People by name]] [[de:Manfred Zimmermann]]
